name: Mojo Verde (Cilantro)
description: Traditional Canarian green mojo made with cilantro.

ingredients: 30 g cilantro (leaves and stems, also called coriander)

instructions: - Place all dry ingredients (cilantro, salt, cumin, garlic, chili if using) in a mortar and grind until a paste forms.
- Add the olive oil and vinegar, mixing until fully combined.
- If using a blender instead: blend 2/3 of the chopped cilantro with half of the oil, mash the remaining 1/3 with a wooden spoon, and combine everything.
- Let the mojo rest for 30 minutes before serving.

serving: Served often with papas arrugadas alongside mojo rojo.
